project1_description: The Nutriboard platform was developed to address the critical challenge of identifying patients at risk of malnutrition. In healthcare settings, malnutrition can significantly impact patient outcomes, prolong hospital stays, and increase mortality rates. However, nutritional risk is often overlooked in routine care.
project1_devops: As a DevOps engineer and backend developer on this project, I was responsible for designing a resilient infrastructure on Microsoft Azure capable of handling sensitive patient data while ensuring high availability and compliance with healthcare regulations.
project2_description: The 5G Test Automation project tackled a critical challenge in telecom testing: the time-consuming and error-prone nature of manual testing for 5G network equipment. With increasing network complexity, traditional manual testing approaches were no longer viable to ensure quality and reliability.
project2_solution: I led the development of a comprehensive automation framework that revolutionized how telecom equipment testing was conducted, reducing test time by 75% while significantly improving coverage and reliability.
project3_description: This project addressed the challenge of manual and inconsistent AWS infrastructure provisioning, which caused deployment delays, configuration drift, and security issues. I developed a comprehensive Infrastructure as Code (IaC) solution using Terraform to automate AWS resource deployment and management.
project3_solution: What started as a simple automation task evolved into a robust modular framework, enabling consistent, secure, and reproducible deployments.
project4_description: The Library Application is a full-stack web app I’m developing to modernize the management of a private book collection. This project showcases my end-to-end development capabilities, as I am solely responsible for all aspects, from design and architecture to implementation and deployment.
project4_solution: Although the app is being developed for a specific client and includes copyrighted resources (restricting public access), it demonstrates my ability to create complete, production-ready applications using modern web technologies.
project_impact: This project demonstrated my ability to implement DevOps best practices in a regulated healthcare environment while contributing to backend development in Java.
